00041 /* Attributes for threads */
00042 struct __sched_param
00043 {
00044   int sched_priority;
00045 };
00046 
00047 typedef struct
00048 {
00049   int     __detachstate;
00050   int     __schedpolicy;
00051   struct  __sched_param __schedparam;
00052   int     __inheritsched;
00053   int     __scope;
00054   size_t  __guardsize;
00055   int     __stackaddr_set;
00056   void   *__stackaddr;
00057   size_t  __stacksize;
